summary: An aspiring actress makes a pact with her fiancé to take a job as an exotic dancer to care for her cancer stricken father. Once the pact the couple made is broken, their lives are changed forever. Based on the true story of director Greg Carter and his girlfriend prior to their moving to Los Angeles in 2005.
cast: Mariel Hemingway|James Remar|Briana Evigan|Stacey Dash|Carmen Electra|Ali Cobrin|Nia Peeples|Omari Hardwick|Obba Babatundé|Lynn Whitfield|LisaRaye McCoy|Wesley Jonathan|K.D. title: Lap Dance
